description: Array T(n,k) read by antidiagonals: (row 0)=squares, (row 1)={numbers m for which the simple continued fraction (CF) of sqrt(m) has period length 1}; once (row n) is defined, let (row n+1) begin with the least positive integer not already in a row and let the rest of (row n+1) be the other m's for which CF(sqrt(m)) has the same period length.
